author: George Georgulas IV <georgegeorgulas@gmail.com> (https://github.com/VirtualEstatePlanner)
name: megadocker
description: A tool to easily create docker swarm stacks

scripts.unbinaries: rm -rf binaries && mkdir -p binaries/mac/intel binaries/mac/arm binaries/win/intel binaries/win/arm binaries/linux/intel binaries/linux/arm
scripts.unelectron: rm -rf public/electron.js && rm -rf electron.js && rm -rf preload.js
scripts.clean: run-p -l unbinaries uncache undist unelectron unerror
scripts.tsc-dev: cp public/preload.js . && cp public/electron.ts . && tsc electron.ts -w
scripts.electron-dev: sleep 15 && wait-on http://localhost:3000 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.develop: cross-env NODE_ENV=development run-p -l tsc-dev react-dev electron-dev
scripts.react-eject: echo 'WARNING: THIS PROCESS CANNOT BE REVERSED - GIT COMMIT FIRST SO YOU CAN ROLL BACK' && echo && echo 'if you really hate create-react-app this much, manually run:' && echo && echo '                                                                 react-scripts eject' && echo
scripts.warning:mac-only: echo && echo 'CRATE warning: This script will only function on macOS' && echo
scripts.warning:docker-only: echo && echo 'CRATE warning: This script will not function without docker' && echo
scripts.dist:linux-intel64: yarn undist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder -l -c ./electron-configs/linux-intel-64.yml && mv dist/*.AppImage binaries/linux/intel/
scripts.dist:linux-arm64: yarn undist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder -l -c ./electron-configs/linux-arm-64.yml && mv dist/*.AppImage binaries/linux/arm/
scripts.dist:mac-intel64: yarn undist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder -m -c ./electron-configs/mac-intel-64.yml && mv dist/*.dmg binaries/mac/intel/
scripts.dist:mac-arm64: yarn undist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder -m -c ./electron-configs/mac-arm-64.yml && mv dist/*.dmg binaries/mac/arm/
scripts.dist:win-intel64: yarn undist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder -w -c ./electron-configs/win-intel-64.yml && mv dist/*.exe binaries/win/intel/
scripts.dist:win-arm64: yarn undist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder -w -c ./electron-configs/win-arm-64.yml && mv dist/*.exe binaries/win/arm/
scripts.dist:win-intel64-docker: yarn warning:docker-only && yarn undist && docker run --rm --env ELECTRON_CACHE='/root/.cache/electron' --env ELECTRON_BUILDER_CACHE='/root/.cache/electron-builder' -v ${PWD}:/project -v ${PWD}/cache/electron:/root/.cache/electron -v ${PWD}/cache/electron-builder:/root/.cache/electron-builder electronuserland/builder:wine-mono yarn dist:win-intel64
scripts.dist:win-arm64-docker: yarn warning:docker-only && yarn undist && docker run --rm --env ELECTRON_BUILDING_WOA=1 --env ELECTRON_CACHE='/root/.cache/electron' --env ELECTRON_BUILDER_CACHE='/root/.cache/electron-builder' --env npm_config_arch='arm64' -v ${PWD}:/project -v ${PWD}/cache/electron:/root/.cache/electron -v ${PWD}/cache/electron-builder:/root/.cache/electron-builder electronuserland/builder:wine-mono yarn dist:win-arm64
scripts.dist:all: run-s -l warning:mac-only clean build-transpile dist:linux dist:mac dist:win-docker
scripts.postdist:all: say 'All distributables output to binaries directory.'
scripts.dist:all-working: run-s -l warning:mac-only clean build-transpile dist:linux dist:mac dist:win-intel64-docker
scripts.postdist:all-working: say 'All distributables output to binaries directory.'
